headline: Schlumberger (SLB) Dives 10.69% as Earnings Disappoint
summary: We recently published These 10 Stocks Fell Hard. Are You Holding Any? Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is one of this week’s top performers. Schlumberger saw its share prices decrease by 10.69 percent week-on-week from $37.31 on July 11 to $33.32 last Friday, as investor sentiment was dampened by a disappointing earnings performance in the second quarter of […]

headline: Schlumberger Limited (SLB) Falls Following its Q2 Results
summary: The share price of Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) fell by 10.69% between July 11 and July 18, 2025, putting it among the Energy Stocks that Lost the Most This Week. Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) is the world’s leading provider of technology for reservoir characterization, drilling, production, and processing to the global energy industry. Schlumberger Limited (NYSE:SLB) fell […]

headline: Schlumberger Limited (SLB) Slid on Falling Oil Prices and Trade Tensions
summary: Ariel Investments, an investment management company, released its “Ariel Appreciation Fund” second-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. Following the initial market decline triggered by the “Liberation Day” tariff announcement, the stock market rebounded, bolstered by heightened interest in AI stocks, positive economic data, and robust corporate earnings. Against […]

headline: SLB anticipates decrease in global upstream investment in 2025
summary: The most significant reductions are expected in North and Latin America, resulting in a nearly 4% drop in the company's share price.

headline: SLB: Oddo BHF remains positive but adjusts TP
summary: Oddo BHF reiterates its outperform rating on SLB and, adjusting its expectations to take into account the acquisition of ChampionX , lowers its target price from $45 to $42 .The broker considers Q2...
